title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Update - version 1.18.15.0 released
description:
Yesterday Asobo released a hotfix for Sim Update 5 which was released last week. In the hotfix several issues are fixed which were introduced in Sim Update 5 and caused a lot of frustration in the MSFS community. The good thing Asobo is really listening to the community and took corrective actions.
